EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-05-17-IT Maturity Survey SLED Commercial Send.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: $25 Amazon Gift Card for a 5 Minute Survey | Public Sector IT Maturity Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/VNRCB2S?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_erxj7fm89c=[marketo_erxj7fm89c_value]]]> {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We are aware that you get hundreds of emails each week from vendors, which is why we wanted to take a moment to let you know we understand your time is extremely valuable and extend an offer to partner with you to support a cause that is close to you. We recently launched our Public Sector IT Maturity Survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/VNRCB2S?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_erxj7fm89c=[marketo_erxj7fm89c_value]]]>, to better understand the challenges faced in achieving your IT goals, and are offering a $25 Amazon gift card for completing the 5 minute survey. We are also offering $100 Amazon gift card for agreeing to a 30 minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer (meeting must within 10 days of survey submission). If at the end of the meeting, you choose to engage in a proof of value, we will donate $1,000 to the 501(c)(3) charity of your choosing. We look forward to the opportunity to speak with you about the benefits Turbonomic can bring to your infrastructure! <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/VNRCB2S?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_erxj7fm89c=[marketo_erxj7fm89c_value]]]> - The Turbonomic Team
